content: प्रद्योतः {@--1@} Irradiating, lighting, illuminating. {@--2@} Splendour, light, lustre. {@--3@} A ray of light. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a king of Ujjayinī, whose daughter Vatsa married; प्रद्योतस्य प्रियदुहितरं वत्सराजोऽत्र जह्ने <ls>Me.</ls> (considered as an interpolation by <ls>Malli.</ls>); <ls>Ratn. 1. 10.</ls>
